text: And the tsitsits had a message sealed inside the knots just as there is a message sealed in the four emblems which are used on Passover, to depict the "time of our freedom. And they are 1) Matzo;2) Bitter Herbs; 3) Salt-water and Chara s a kind of fruit mixture in likeness of the appearance of mortar); and (4) an attitude to lean back. are used on Passover,to depict the"Hiwe of our freedow". And they are (1) Mat2o;(2) Bi+er Herbs;(3)Sa-water and Charauses (a kind of fruit wixture in likeness of the appearance of worlar)j and4) an atlitude to lean back.
